features: This stunning necklace showcases a modern take on the traditional Haaram. The delicate gold chain is adorned with diamond-studded floral motifs, leading to a captivating pendant. The pendant features a central emerald surrounded by intricate diamond detailing and a ruby accent, followed by another emerald centered, and pearl drops at the base for added elegance. The floral arrangement showcases meticulous craftsmanship. Its very light in weight, it offers high comfort.
colors: and the soft ivory of South Sea pearls.
occasions: and elegant modern parties. Adds a touch of regal charm to any traditional attire
and can also complement contemporary outfits.
description: This necklace is a statement piece that blends traditional South Indian aesthetics with modern design sensibilities. The combination of high-quality gemstones, lustrous pearls, and impeccable craftsmanship ensures both beauty and lasting value. The traditional 'Hyderabadi Polish' enhances the gold's luster, making it a heirloom-worthy piece. The use of rubies, emeralds, and pearls together is considered auspicious in South Indian culture, adding to its significance.
